means: 浮华而不实用的，附庸风雅的，假装朴实的

sentence.Network_en: The artsy - ginsy exurb was no place for Salinger.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个附庸风雅的远郊地区也不是塞林格能呆的地方.

sentence.Network_en: Japanese media have been digging up video of Hatoyama's formerly less - known artsy side.
sentence.Network_cn: 这段时间日本媒体纷纷曝料鸠山早年少为人知的具有艺术气质的一面.

sentence.Network_en: French: Your love of poetry, culture and artsy movies means that French is perfect for you.
sentence.Network_cn: 法语: 你喜欢诗歌 、 文化和文艺类的电影,这都意味着法语更适合你.
